edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse

Class File_Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.File_Handler

  • public class File_Handler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class deals with all interactions between the game and saving/loading functions. Primarily the only objects that are saved are the Grid and Player, this is also true for the objects that are loaded.
    Author:
    Andrew Niklas, Andrew Nipp, Ben Nickerson

    • Method Detail

      • fileLander

        public void fileLander(java.lang.String choice,
                       Grid grid,
                       Player player)
        This method is called when either the user saves or loads a game. It does this by collecting a String with the value of "save" or "load". "Save" saves the Grid and Player objects by passing them to saveFile(Grid, Player). "Load" loads the Grid by calling openFile(Grid).
        Parameters:
        choice - String with value of "save" or "load"
        grid - Grid savedGrid that will be saved or overwritten
        player - Player in its state from the point that the game is saved

      • openFile

        public void openFile(Grid grid)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        This method serves to overwrite the Game Object Grid by calling Grid.overwriteGOG(GameObject[][]) where the [][] is the first object read by ois.
        Parameters:
        grid - Grid object that will be overwritten.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • openGrid

        public Grid openGrid()
        This method returns the Grid object to be used when the game is continued. It does this by reading the Grid with ois and saving it to savedGrid.
        Returns:
        Grid savedGrid

      • loadPlayer

        public Player loadPlayer()
        This method returns the Player object to be used when the game is continued. It does this by reading the Player with ois and saving it to savedPLayer
        Returns:
        Player savedPlayer - object containing the Player object from the save file.

      • saveFile

        public void saveFile(Grid grid,
                     Player plr)
        This method saves Grid.gog, Grid, and Player into three separate files named "save.obj", "save.grid", and "save.plr" respectively. It uses oos to perform these functions.

      • noFileError

        public void noFileError()
